aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: A multidisciplinary destination of learning and innovation, propelling quality in higher education with a record of being India’s youngest private university to receive NAAC A++ accreditation in the first cycle. Situated in Vadodara, Gujarat, Parul University, is an embodiment of the nation's essence of cultural heritage blended with modern innovations and academic practices for student enrichment, while fostering national and global development.

identifierForm.identifierInputHint: Enter your Enrollment or Convocation No.

footer.copyright: CSE Department, Parul Institute of Technology, FET, Parul University

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Parul University - Gujarat’s leading private university having the foundation of its first Institution laid in 1993 as Parul Group of Institutes, and later established and incorporated as Parul University in 2015 under the Gujarat Private Universities (Second Amendment) Act of 2009.
